dialogTextOptIn: MEGAJACKPOT gives you the chance to win big - opt in to contribute {buyInAmount} on every round.
dialogTextOptOut: You are now playing as part of the Megajackpot.
dialogRules: To participate in the jackpot, the player has to opt in and play a game associated with the jackpot.
Megajackpot is a progressive jackpot, every contribution increases the value of the jackpot.
By opting in, the player agrees to be debited for every contribution towards the jackpot, which will be drawn after each game round in the associated game.
The cost per contribution is {buyInAmount} and can not be changed.
To add a contribution to the jackpot, the bet in the assocated game has to be above {buyInAmount}.
Contributions to the jackpot can be placed with either real money or bonus money.
